verses.verse: <S%G5119>Then<s%> shall the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> be <S%G3666>likened<s%> to <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G3933>virgins,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> their <S%G2985>lamps,<s%> and <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>forth<s%> to <S%G529>meet<s%> the bridegroom. <S%G3566><s%>
And <S%G4002>five<s%> of them were <S%G5429>wise,<s%> and five <S%G4002><s%> were foolish. <S%G3474><s%>
They that were <S%G3474>foolish<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> their <S%G2985>lamps,<s%> and <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1637>oil<s%> with them:
But the <S%G5429>wise<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G1637>oil<s%> in their <S%G30>vessels<s%> with their lamps. <S%G2985><s%>
While the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> <S%G5549>tarried,<s%> they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3573>slumbered<s%> and slept. <S%G2518><s%>

And at midnight <S%G3319><s%> <S%G3571><s%> there was a <S%G2906>cry<s%> <S%G1096>made,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> <S%G2064>comes;<s%> <S%G1831>go<s%> you out to <S%G529>meet<s%> him.
<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G3933>virgins<s%> <S%G1453>arose,<s%> and <S%G2885>trimmed<s%> their lamps. <S%G2985><s%>
And the <S%G3474>foolish<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G5429>wise,<s%> <S%G1325>Give<s%> us of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1637>oil;<s%> for our <S%G2985>lamps<s%> are <S%G4570>gone<s%> out.

But the <S%G5429>wise<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Not <S%G3779>so;<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> there be not <S%G714>enough<s%> for us and you: but <S%G4198>go<s%> you <S%G3123>rather<s%> to them that <S%G4453>sell,<s%> and <S%G59>buy<s%> for yourselves. <S%G1438><s%>

And while they <S%G565>went<s%> to <S%G59>buy,<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> <S%G2064>came;<s%> and they that were <S%G2092>ready<s%> <S%G1525>went<s%> in with him to the <S%G1062>marriage:<s%> and the <S%G2374>door<s%> was shut. <S%G2808><s%>
<S%G5305>Afterward<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G3933>virgins,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G455>open<s%> to us.
But he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, I <S%G1492>know<s%> you not.

<S%G1127>Watch<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> for you <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> comes. <S%G2064><s%>

For the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is as a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G589>traveling<s%> into a far country, <S%G589><s%> who <S%G2564>called<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1401>servants,<s%> and <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to them his goods. <S%G5224><s%>

And to one <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> he <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G5007>talents,<s%> to <S%G3739>another<s%> <S%G1417>two,<s%> and to <S%G3739>another<s%> <S%G1520>one;<s%> to <S%G1538>every<s%> man <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G2398>several<s%> <S%G1411>ability;<s%> and <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G589>took<s%> his journey. <S%G589><s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> he that had <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G5007>talents<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> and <S%G2038>traded<s%> with the <S%G846>same,<s%> and made <S%G4160><s%> them <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> talents. <S%G5007><s%>
And <S%G5615>likewise<s%> he that had received <S%G1417>two,<s%> he <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2770>gained<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> two. <S%G1417><s%>
But he that had <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> and <S%G3736>dig<s%> in the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and <S%G613>hid<s%> his <S%G2962>lord's<s%> money. <S%G694><s%>
<S%G3326>After<s%> a <S%G4183>long<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> the <S%G2962>lord<s%> of <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> and reckons <S%G4868><s%> <S%G3056><s%> with them.

And <S%G2532>so<s%> he that had <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G5007>talents<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G4374>brought<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G5007>talents,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> you <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to me <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G5007>talents:<s%> <S%G2396>behold,<s%> I have <S%G2770>gained<s%> <S%G1909>beside<s%> them <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G5007>talents<s%> more. <S%G243><s%>

His <S%G2962>lord<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to him, <S%G2095>Well<s%> done, you <S%G18>good<s%> and <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1401>servant:<s%> you have <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%> things, I will <S%G2525>make<s%> you <S%G2525>ruler<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> things: <S%G1525>enter<s%> you <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5479>joy<s%> of your lord. <S%G2962><s%>

He <S%G2532>also<s%> that had <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5007>talents<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> you <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to me <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5007>talents:<s%> <S%G2396>behold,<s%> I have <S%G2770>gained<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G5007>talents<s%> <S%G1909>beside<s%> them.

His <S%G2962>lord<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to him, <S%G2095>Well<s%> done, <S%G18>good<s%> and <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1401>servant;<s%> you have <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%> things, I will <S%G2525>make<s%> you <S%G2525>ruler<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> things: <S%G1525>enter<s%> you <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5479>joy<s%> of your lord. <S%G2962><s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> he which had <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5007>talent<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> I <S%G1097>knew<s%> you that you <S%G1488>are<s%> an <S%G4642>hard<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G2325>reaping<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> you have not <S%G4687>sown,<s%> and <S%G4863>gathering<s%> <S%G3606>where<s%> you have not strewed: <S%G1287><s%>

And I was <S%G5399>afraid,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> and <S%G2928>hid<s%> your <S%G5007>talent<s%> in the <S%G1093>earth:<s%> see, <S%G2396><s%> there you have <S%G2192><s%> that is yours. <S%G4674><s%>

His <S%G2962>lord<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, You <S%G4190>wicked<s%> and <S%G3636>slothful<s%> <S%G1401>servant,<s%> you <S%G1492>knew<s%> that I <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> I <S%G4687>sowed<s%> not, and <S%G4863>gather<s%> <S%G3606>where<s%> I have not strewed: <S%G1287><s%>

You <S%G1163>ought<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to have <S%G906>put<s%> my <S%G694>money<s%> to the <S%G5133>exchangers,<s%> and then at my <S%G2064>coming<s%> I should have <S%G2865>received<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> own with usury. <S%G5110><s%>
<S%G142>Take<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G5007>talent<s%> from him, and give <S%G1325><s%> it to him which <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> talents. <S%G5007><s%>

For to <S%G3956>every<s%> one that <S%G2192>has<s%> shall be <S%G1325>given,<s%> and he shall have <S%G4052>abundance:<s%> but from him that <S%G2192>has<s%> not shall be <S%G142>taken<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> that which he has. <S%G2192><s%>

And <S%G1544>cast<s%> you the <S%G888>unprofitable<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1857>outer<s%> <S%G4655>darkness:<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> shall be <S%G2805>weeping<s%> and <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>

<S%G3752>When<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> shall <S%G2064>come<s%> in his <S%G1391>glory,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> with him, <S%G5119>then<s%> shall he <S%G2523>sit<s%> on the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of his glory: <S%G1391><s%>

And <S%G1715>before<s%> him shall be <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations:<s%> and he shall <S%G873>separate<s%> them <S%G240>one<s%> from <S%G240>another,<s%> as a <S%G4166>shepherd<s%> divides <S%G873><s%> his <S%G4263>sheep<s%> from the goats: <S%G2056><s%>
And he shall <S%G2476>set<s%> the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> his <S%G1188>right<s%> hand, but the <S%G2055>goats<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the left. <S%G2176><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> shall the <S%G935>King<s%> <S%G2046>say<s%> to them <S%G1537>on<s%> his <S%G1188>right<s%> hand, <S%G1205>Come,<s%> you <S%G2127>blessed<s%> of my <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2816>inherit<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G2090>prepared<s%> for you from the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the world: <S%G2889><s%>

For I was an <S%G3983>hungered,<s%> and you <S%G1325>gave<s%> me <S%G5315>meat:<s%> I was <S%G1372>thirsty,<s%> and you <S%G4222>gave<s%> me <S%G4222>drink:<s%> I was a <S%G3581>stranger,<s%> and you <S%G4863>took<s%> me in:
<S%G1131>Naked,<s%> and you <S%G4016>clothed<s%> me: I was <S%G770>sick,<s%> and you <S%G1980>visited<s%> me: I was in <S%G5438>prison,<s%> and you <S%G2064>came<s%> to me.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> shall the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G611>answer<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4218>when<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> we you an <S%G3983>hungered,<s%> and fed <S%G5142><s%> you? <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1372>thirsty,<s%> and gave <S%G4222><s%> you drink? <S%G4222><s%>
<S%G4218>When<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> we you a <S%G3581>stranger,<s%> and took <S%G4863><s%> you in? <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1131>naked,<s%> and clothed <S%G4016><s%> you?
<S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G4218>when<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> we you <S%G772>sick,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> in <S%G5438>prison,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> to you?

And the <S%G935>King<s%> shall <S%G611>answer<s%> and <S%G2046>say<s%> to them, <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, Inasmuch <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3745><s%> as you have done <S%G4160><s%> it to <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1646>least<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> my <S%G80>brothers,<s%> you have done <S%G4160><s%> it to me.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> shall he <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to them <S%G1537>on<s%> the <S%G2176>left<s%> hand, <S%G4198>Depart<s%> from me, you <S%G2672>cursed,<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G4442>fire,<s%> <S%G2090>prepared<s%> for the <S%G1228>devil<s%> and his angels: <S%G32><s%>
For I was an <S%G3983>hungered,<s%> and you <S%G1325>gave<s%> me <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5315>meat:<s%> I was <S%G1372>thirsty,<s%> and you <S%G4222>gave<s%> me <S%G3756>no<s%> drink: <S%G4222><s%>

I was a <S%G3581>stranger,<s%> and you <S%G4863>took<s%> me not in: <S%G1131>naked,<s%> and you <S%G4016>clothed<s%> me not: <S%G772>sick,<s%> and in <S%G5438>prison,<s%> and you <S%G1980>visited<s%> me not.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> shall they <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G611>answer<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4218>when<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> we you an <S%G3983>hungered,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1372>thirsty,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G3581>stranger,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1131>naked,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G772>sick,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> in <S%G5438>prison,<s%> and did not <S%G1247>minister<s%> to you?

<S%G5119>Then<s%> shall he <S%G611>answer<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, Inasmuch <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3745><s%> as you did <S%G4160><s%> it not to <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1646>least<s%> of <S%G5130>these,<s%> you did <S%G4160><s%> it not to me.

And <S%G3778>these<s%> shall <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G2851>punishment:<s%> but the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> eternal. <S%G166><s%>
